Include these codes as defined in https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes
CodeDisplayDefinition
EmCare.A.DE13Estimated age in years/months for child (2 months or older)The age of the client is estimated based on physical evidence
EmCare.A.DE14Estimated age in weeks/days for young infant (under 2 months old)The Caregiver provides the age in weeks/days/hours
EmCare.A.DE15Estimated Date of BirthEstimated Date of Birth of the Client

title.value: Provide an estimated age or estimated date of birth

description.value: The client/caregiver will provide an estimated age or estimated date of birth

display.value: Estimated age in years/months for child (2 months or older)

value.value: The age of the client is estimated based on physical evidence

display.value: Estimated age in weeks/days for young infant (under 2 months old)

value.value: The Caregiver provides the age in weeks/days/hours
Estimated Date of Birth of the Client
